long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform every new tab into your personalized feed reader. FeedBoxer replaces Chrome's default new tab page with a clean, unified content feed from your favorite sources across the web.
Stay informed effortlessly as you browse:

- Read content from any website or RSS feed
- Each article appears exactly once - no duplicates
- Content automatically marks as read while you scroll
- Clean, distraction-free reading experience
- Works with news sites, blogs, Reddit, tech sites, and more
- Syncs across all your Chrome browsers
- No account required to start reading

Perfect for:

- News readers who want to stay informed
- Tech enthusiasts following multiple sources
- Reddit users who want a cleaner experience
- Anyone who wants to organize their daily reading

FeedBoxer makes content consumption seamless by turning every new tab into an opportunity to discover fresh, relevant content. Never see the same article twice, and always stay up to date with what matters to you.

Save time and stay organized with a smarter way to consume web content. Install FeedBoxer now and transform your new tab experience.
